CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Appointment_Date__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Follow_Up_Date_Time__c)), IF( Appointment_Date__c >= Follow_Up_Date_Time__c, Appointment_Date__c, Follow_Up_Date_Time__c ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Appointment_Date__c)), Appointment_Date__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Follow_Up_Date_Time__c)), Follow_Up_Date_Time__c, CreatedDate ) ) )
CustomField.label: Call at Date
